snippet: Richard Dawkins, the evolutionary biologist, has moved to a new publisher for his next book, the story of his intellectual evolution and his work as an atheist.
abstract: Richard Dawkins, the evolutionary biologist, has moved publishers and will publish his next book with the HarperCollins imprint Ecco.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Richard Dawkins, the evolutionary biologist, has moved to a new publisher for his next book, the story of his intellectual evolution and his work as an atheist.

headline.main: A New Publisher for Richard Dawkins
headline.print_headline: A New Publisher For Richard Dawkins
